isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - IC BUS

svcsection.title: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - IC BUS

geninfo.para: USE WITH CIRCUIT DIAGRAM BOOK S08248.
Refer to S08010 (CTS-5234) for Test Equipment and Connector Repair.
Refer to S08246 (CTS-5264) for Allison WTEC III Transmission Electronic Controls.
Refer to S08247 for Allison 2000 Series™ (LCT) Transmission Electronic Controls.
Refer to S04033 (CTS-5250) for Air ABS Troubleshooting for IC Bus.
Refer to S04039Y for Hyd ABS Troubleshooting for IC Bus.
Refer to S08268 (CTS-5280) Hydro-Max II Brake Monitor System.
Refer to EGES-175 for DT 466E Electronic Engine Control System Circuits Function and Diagnostics.
Refer to EGES-190 for T 444E Electronic Engine Control System Circuits Function and Diagnostics.
